name: part_009
file: tmp_真夏のReGLOSSカラオケ！〜新曲披露もあるよ〜【#真夏のReGLOSS】 [DiHB5voNt00]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Kanade and Raden finish their emotional performance of 'Planetarium'.
The members celebrate the performance and discuss the next song choice.
All members of ReGLOSS perform 'Tentai Kansoku' together.

subtitles.original: 願いを流れ星に
subtitles.english: I whispered a wish to a falling star

subtitles.original: そっと唱えてみたけれど
subtitles.english: Softly and quietly

subtitles.original: 泣きたいよ...
subtitles.english: I want to cry...

subtitles.original: 届かない...
subtitles.english: I can't reach you...

subtitles.original: 想いをこの空に...
subtitles.english: Sending my feelings to this sky...

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: すごーい！
subtitles.english: That was amazing!

subtitles.original: ハイタッチ！ハイタッチまじで！
subtitles.english: High five! Seriously, high five!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry.

subtitles.original: ちょっと悲しい感じのやつ
subtitles.english: That was a bit of a sad one.

subtitles.original: はい！プラネタリウムでした！
subtitles.english: Alright! That was Planetarium!

subtitles.original: よかった〜！
subtitles.english: That was great!

subtitles.original: もうライブパフォーマンスやん、マジで
subtitles.english: That was like a real live performance, seriously.

subtitles.original: 凄すぎるやろ
subtitles.english: It's just too good.

subtitles.original: よっしゃ、もう一回聞きたい
subtitles.english: Alright, I want to hear it again.

subtitles.original: もうあの、体力がないです、私
subtitles.english: I... I don't have any stamina left.

subtitles.original: あ、そっか。体力か
subtitles.english: Ah, right. Stamina.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、奏、歌う？一緒に
subtitles.english: Well then, Kanade, shall we sing together?

subtitles.original: いいよ！
subtitles.english: Sure!

subtitles.original: あんたも歌いたい、みんなで、歌いたい！
subtitles.english: You want to sing too? Let's all sing!

subtitles.original: 何歌う？何歌う？
subtitles.english: What should we sing? What should we sing?

subtitles.original: ノリノリ...あの曲行っちゃいますか？
subtitles.english: Something upbeat... Shall we go with THAT song?

subtitles.original: 何何？
subtitles.english: Which one?

subtitles.original: なんだろう...
subtitles.english: I wonder what it is...

subtitles.original: やっぱお星様がキラキラしたら、もう一回キラキラしたいんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Since the stars were sparkling, don't you want to sparkle one more time?

subtitles.original: お！プラネタリウムから、外に出ちゃう？
subtitles.english: Oh! Are we going outside the planetarium?

subtitles.original: それ！
subtitles.english: That's it!

subtitles.original: 何の曲かな？
subtitles.english: I wonder what song it is?

subtitles.original: じゃあ行きましょう、お願いします！
subtitles.english: Alright, let's go! Music, please!

subtitles.original: どっちからだっけ？
subtitles.english: Who starts again?

subtitles.original: 奏から、あ、奏から
subtitles.english: It's Kanade. Ah, Kanade starts.

subtitles.original: 午前二時 フミキリに 望遠鏡を担いでった
subtitles.english: At 2 AM, by the railroad crossing, I carried my telescope

subtitles.original: ベルトに結んだラジオ 雨は降らないらしい
subtitles.english: With a radio tied to my belt, they said it wouldn't rain

subtitles.original: 二分後に君が来た 大袈裟な荷物しょって来た
subtitles.english: Two minutes later you arrived, carrying a huge bag on your back

subtitles.original: 始めようか 天体観測 ほうき星を探して
subtitles.english: Shall we start our stargazing, searching for a comet?

subtitles.original: 深い闇に飲まれないように 精一杯だった
subtitles.english: I was doing my best not to be swallowed by the deep darkness

subtitles.original: 君の震える手を 握ろうとしたあの日は
subtitles.english: On that day when I tried to hold your trembling hand

subtitles.original: 見えないモノを見ようとして 望遠鏡を覗き込んだ
subtitles.english: Trying to see the invisible, I looked through the telescope

subtitles.original: 静寂を切り裂いて いくつも声が生まれたよ
subtitles.english: Ripping through the silence, many voices were born

subtitles.original: 明日が僕らを呼んだって 返事もろくにしなかった
subtitles.english: Even if tomorrow called us, we wouldn't even answer

subtitles.original: 「イマ」というほうき星 君と二人追いかけていた
subtitles.english: The comet called 'Now', we were chasing it together

subtitles.original: 気が付けばいつだって ひたすら何か探している
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, I was always searching for something

subtitles.original: 幸せの定義とか 哀しみの置き場とか
subtitles.english: The definition of happiness, or a place for sadness

subtitles.original: 生まれたら死ぬまで ずっと探してる
subtitles.english: From birth until death, I'll be searching forever

subtitles.original: さぁ 始めようか 天体観測 ほうき星を探して
subtitles.english: Now, shall we start our stargazing, searching for a comet?

subtitles.original: 今まで見つけたモノは 全部覚えている
subtitles.english: Everything I've found so far, I remember it all

subtitles.original: 君の震える手を 握れなかった痛みも
subtitles.english: Even the pain of not being able to hold your trembling hand

subtitles.original: 知らないモノを知ろうとして 望遠鏡を覗き込んだ
subtitles.english: Trying to know the unknown, I looked through the telescope

subtitles.original: 暗闇を照らす様な 微かな光探したよ
subtitles.english: I searched for a faint light, as if to illuminate the darkness

subtitles.original: そうして知った痛みを 未だに僕は覚えている
subtitles.english: And the pain I learned then, I still remember it even now

subtitles.original: 「イマ」というほうき星 今も一人追いかけている
subtitles.english: The comet called 'Now', I'm still chasing it alone

subtitles.original: 背が伸びるにつれて 伝えたい事も増えてった
subtitles.english: As I grew taller, the things I wanted to tell you increased

subtitles.original: 宛名の無い手紙も 崩れる程重なった
subtitles.english: Letters with no recipient, they piled up until they collapsed

subtitles.original: 僕は元気でいるよ 心配事も少ないよ
subtitles.english: I'm doing well, I don't have many worries

subtitles.original: ただひとつ 今も思い出すよ
subtitles.english: But there's just one thing I still remember now

subtitles.original: 予報外れの雨に 打たれて泣きだしそうな
subtitles.english: Being hit by unpredicted rain, as if about to cry

subtitles.original: 君の震える手を 握れなかったあの日の
subtitles.english: On that day when I couldn't hold your trembling hand

subtitles.original: 見えてるモノを見落として 望遠鏡をまた担いで
subtitles.english: Overlooking what was visible, I carried my telescope once again

subtitles.original: 静寂と暗闇の 帰り道を駆け抜けた
subtitles.english: And ran through the way back, in the silence and darkness
